p.text: Useful Objects (date, files and paths, registry) function like standard objects, but they have no graphic interface and are designed for interaction with the OS "Windows" (in order to open a file, get date and time or cursor coordinates).

textAll.p: Useful Objects extend substantially the possibilities of working in Algorithm2. Using them you can get to the core of the OS (for example, you can change Wall paper of the desktop). Moreover, they help to simplify some calculations (e.g. calculations of dates).

i.text: The list of all Useful Objects:
